author: bodewig
msg: use the same logic as getResource in getResourceAsStream.  PR 44103

author: slaws
msg: Change warning to error as per spec. Caught when running ASM_8010

author: hadrian
msg: CAMEL-316.  More cleanup of getFault()

author: fmeschbe
msg: FELIX-1413 Do not immediately bind to newly registered services for static
references. Also fixed the situation of service properties of bound
service changing: if a bound service property change causes the component
to be reactivated (e.g. because of static dependency) the handling of
the service modified event is terminated.

author: arkurth
msg: VCL-192
Updated xCAT modules so that image retrieval works with xCAT 2.1 using management node ports defined in the database.
Removed subroutines from xCAT21.pm which were either identical to those in xCAT.pm or updated in xCAT.pm to work with both versions:
_rpower()
does_image_exist()
retrieve_image()
_get_image_repository_path()
power_reset()
power_on()
power_off()
power_status()
Fixed 1 call in xCAT21.pm to _rpower(). Added "$self->" to the call.
Removed .gz file extension checks in xCAT.pm::_get_image_repository_path() allowing it to work with both xCAT versions.
Simplified xCAT.pm::_get_image_template_path(). It had a lot of duplicated code from _get_image_repository_path().
